data.fileformats

Class ENVIFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.fileformats.ENVIFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileFormat

    public class ENVIFormat
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileFormat
    FileFormat to read ENVI hyperspectral data files
    Author:
    pwelke

    • Constructor Detail

      • ENVIFormat

        public ENVIFormat()
        Argument free constructor for persistence. Note: You may use this constructor to create a view on an envi file at /bla/morebla/data.bla . Then, the implementation will try to find a header at /bla/morebla/data.hdr . If the header file has a different name or extension, you have to use the one argument constructor instead.

      • ENVIFormat

        public ENVIFormat(java.io.File header)
        Read ENVI files that are described by the given header file
